subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: BOSTON, May 24 — Manny Ramírez ran this time when he demolished the baseballs. Dropped his bat, did not pose, did not preen, and ran. For once, Ramírez twice acted the way most players normally do and he showed respect for the pitchers, who happened to be Randy Johnson and Scott Proctor.
